page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN CUDWORTH
page.content:
Some residents of{Cudworth}do not need to travel to find{employment}as there are{several small factories}employing local labour.
Albert Martin (Clothing manufacturer) F Handley (Baker) Haslehurst's (Builder's Merchants) Walker's (Builder's) Stothard's (Builder's Merchants) Haseldene's (Garage) Scrapyards (Dismantling old cars and buses to recycle the metal) Maggot Farm (Breeding Maggots for fishermen) Myatt's (Haulage) Blue Circle (Cement works) Slaughterhouse (Used by local farmers and butchers)
